Text: Anyone know where to find a restore disc for a IBM T42(Type2373)
try just www.ibm.com and you will find it :p
There is no downloadable recovery discs on IBM or Lenovo website for Thinkpad notebooks. But you can order them from Lenovo, normally a recovery pack cost about 40$ plus tax.

Sorry, One more question please. Is the RnR 4.1 original or you upgraded it and created the discs?
The original recovery disc is RnR 4.0, after I download and upgrade RnR 4.1, the program recommended me to create a new recovery CD pack, and I did it. This is the recovery disc created by RnR 4.1

After the longtime recovery. Vista runs ok. But the one key recovery doesn't work. I find in Vista system there is no revovery and resure software. After installing the  RnR4.1 again. The one key recovery works.
